source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger is wearing a pensive look.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_00<tab>ボトムラングのウリエンジェは、神妙な面持ちだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_01<tab>Ahead of the coming trials, Urianger bids you take your ease while the others carry out the work on the Ladder.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_01<tab>ウリエンジェから、しばし休むよう言われた。ボトムラングの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EABEA01 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_02<tab>As you observe the final stages of the Ladder's restoration, Emet-Selch arrives unannounced. In the course of waxing sentimental, he raises the prospect of you joining him as an equal─a complete existence in a complete world. No sooner does the Ascian take his leave than Ardbert appears in his place. As the Talos come to life to hearty cheers, he speaks to you of his struggles against solitude, and warns you against making a choice that leaves you alone. At that moment, Alphinaud and Alisaie rush up to you excitedly. The Ladder lives again, and you join the twins as the first souls to ride the lift in twenty years.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_02<tab>しばし待機し、復活したラダー大昇降機に乗り込んだ。トップラングの「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_03<tab>While you await the others at Top Rung, Alisaie calls to you from the nearby outlook, and you and Alphinaud hurry to join her.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_03<tab>アルフィノと話した。トップラングの「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_04<tab>According to Alisaie, she witnessed someone emerge from the village to the northeast, even though the area is believed to have been abandoned. Lest you doubt her words, she urges you to take a look for yourself.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_04<tab>アリゼーから謎の人影を見たと言われた。トップラングの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC0C01 /var>」から、正体不明の人影を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_05<tab>Scanning the area around the village, you spot the mysterious person, who appeared to be spying in your direction. Uncomfortable at not knowing who is out there, Alisaie suggests that you investigate the village.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_05<tab>正体不明の人影を発見した。コルシア島のアミティーで、情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_06<tab>While the village appears devoid of people, there is evidence to suggest that it is very much inhabited, and you take your findings to Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_06<tab>いくつかの気になる点を調べた。アミティーのアルフィノと話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_07<tab>As you ponder what to do about the hiding villagers, a voice calls out. It is revealed to belong to none other than Tristol, the young artist whose life you saved in Kholusia. He informs you that the village, Amity, is a settlement for those who survived being exiled from Eulmore, and upon learning that you are in pursuit of Vauthry, promises to aid you in your quest.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_07<tab>アルフィノと話していたところ、画家のトリストルがやってきた。この村は、ユールモアから追放されながらも生き延びた人々が、細々暮らす場所だという。彼らの協力も得ることができたので、引き続き、グルグ火山を目指そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_08<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_08<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_00<tab>Wait for the work to be completed.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EABEA01 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_01<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_02<tab>アリゼーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_03<tab>Search the area for the mysterious person.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC0C01 /var>から、正体不明の人影を捜索

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_04<tab>Investigate the village.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_04<tab>村の情報を集める

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_05<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TODO_06<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>The work proceeds apace, I'm pleased to say. When it is restored, the Ladder will not only be our way forward; it will represent a momentous step towards lasting change for Kholusia.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_000みんなのおかげで、だいぶ準備が整ってきたんだ。
ラダー大昇降機が動くことが、単なる経路確保に留まらず、
コルシア島の変化の第一歩となってくれることを願うよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>I've rounded up as much material as I could for the work. Just my little bit for the cause.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_005不足していた資材は、集められるだけ集めてきたわ。
アルフィノが信じて拓いた道ですもの、
やれるだけのことはやってあげるわよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_THANCRED_000_010<tab>The Eulmorans have rallied quite impressively. Amidst great adversity, a little purpose never goes astray.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_THANCRED_000_010住民たちのことにしても、いい流れになってる。
このままの勢いで、ヴァウスリーに追いつきたいところだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_RYNE_000_015<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I heard you went to find lumber.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_RYNE_000_015あっ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
木材は手に入りましたか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_RYNE_000_016<tab>From afar, the Ladder looked like it was made entirely of metal, but there's actually a lot of wood if you look for it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_RYNE_000_016この大昇降機、遠くから見たときは、
黒いから鉄だとばっかり思っていたのですが……
よく見ると、木が使われている部分も多いんですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>By the intensity with which he works, 'tis as if all of that reluctance was a lie.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>……大丈夫かしら、ダイダロス社の跡取りさんは。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_CHAINUZZ_000_025<tab>Hmph, such a primitive, inefficient design! A much smaller Talos from our company could just as easily perform the same task!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_CHAINUZZ_000_025ぐぬぬ……なんて半端な設計だ！
うちのタロースだったら、もっと効率的に動くものを！
これだから他社製品は……ブツブツ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_DULIACHAI_000_030<tab>Oh, he'll have them moving again soon! I know he will!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_DULIACHAI_000_030大変、あの人ったら、すごい汗だわ。
それだけがんばってるなら、きっと間もなく、
タロースが動くに違いないわね！

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_URIANGER_000_040<tab>Ah, but prematurely do I give myself to sentimental musings. Many more pressing concerns demand our attention, not the least of which is the matter of how we might reach the mountain, detached from the land as it is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_URIANGER_000_040おっと……感傷に浸るには、いささか早すぎましょう。
今はまず、大昇降機を動かし、
浮遊した山にたどり着かねばなりません。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_URIANGER_000_041<tab>For the present, 'twould appear we have matters here well in hand. Perhaps thou shouldst take thine ease for a time? Thou wilt need every onze of thy strength for the trials ahead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_URIANGER_000_041見たところ、人手は不足していないようですので、
あなたはしばし、身を休めていてください。
このあとも、戦いは続くのですから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_URIANGER_000_050<tab>Thy zeal is commendable, my friend, but rest assured we shall not want for hands. Pray take thine ease in preparation for the trials ahead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_URIANGER_000_050あなたはしばし、身を休めていてください。
造船所の職人たちも合流してくださるのなら、なおのこと……。
昇降機が動いたあとに備えていただくのが、得策かと。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>あれって……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_EULMOREMAN03634_000_065<tab>If you're looking for your friends, they were about to board the lift when someone or other arrived.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_EULMOREMAN03634_000_065君たちの仲間なら、昇降機に乗ろうとしてたけど、
誰かが来たとかで、一旦そちらに行ったみたいよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_EULMOREMAN03634_000_066<tab>They said not to mind them, that they'll be along soon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_EULMOREMAN03634_000_066もし君が案じて降りてきたら、
「すぐに行くから心配しないで」と伝えるよう言われたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>And here we finally are, at Top Rung.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_070ここが、ラダー大昇降機の上……
先ほどまでいたボトムラングに対して、
「トップラング」と呼ばれる場所だそうだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>The others should arrive ere long─
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_071ひとまずは、この場でウリエンジェたちも昇ってくるのを、
待っていようかと思うのだが……

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>(-Alisaie-)Alphinaud, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Come up here! There's something I need you to see!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_072(-アリゼー-)アルフィノ！　)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ちょっとこっちに来て！

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_073<tab>What could this be about?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_073アリゼー……？
階段の上だろうか、行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>That appears to be a village...
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>あそこに見えるのは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>There's a village, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Over to the northeast.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_090)) (( )) 02 /var>、あなたも見て！
北東の方角に、集落らしきものがあるのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>So there is. Yet after two decades without the Ladder in operation, I would not be surprised if such an isolated settlement had long since been abandoned.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_091しかし、断崖の上へは、もう20年は人が来ていないはず……。
あれも廃村ではないのだろうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_092<tab>Nor I. But that was before I spied someone leave it and proceed to head in our direction, all the while trying to remain unseen...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_092私も最初はそう思ったんだけどね……。
じっと見ていたら、人が村からでてきて、
コソコソ隠れながら、こっちに近づいて来たのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_093<tab>Whoever this mysterious person is, they should still be out there. Go on and take a look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_093ねえ、あなたも見てみて。
近づいてきた人は、まだ近くにいるはずだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_100<tab>So long as they have the resources to sustain themselves, it's entirely possible that people could still be about...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_100誰もいないはずの断崖の上にいる人物……。
どういうことだ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_105<tab>Go on and take a look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The mysterious person should still be out there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_105あなたも、そこから見渡してみて。
近づいてきた人は、まだ近くにいるはずだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>Search your surroundings for the mysterious person. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the figure and inspect them with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_110「正体不明の人影」の捜索を開始します。
それらしき人物を発見したら、ズームをしてから、
左クリック)) ((ボタン/ボタン)) /var>で確認しましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_111<tab>There's someone, right? And they were spying on us. Personally, I don't feel comfortable not knowing who they are. What do you say we investigate?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_111ね、誰かいたでしょう？
わからないままっていうのも不安だから、
一度、あとを追いかけてみない？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_112<tab>I'm curious too, I must admit. And I daresay we have a bit of time ere the others ascend.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_112……一理ある。
ウリエンジェたちが上がってくるのに、
時間もかかっているみたいだし、行ってみようか。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_113<tab>It's settled, then. Let's head to the village and see if it's indeed inhabited.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_113そう来なくちゃ！
北東に見えている村まで行って、人がいれば声をかけるし、
姿がなければ探索をしてみましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>The crates and barrels are laden with unknown contents.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>木箱にもタルにも、しっかり中身が詰まっているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_125<tab>I could have sworn I heard a noise...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_125物音がしたような気がするんだけど……
中はよく見えないわね。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>You hear faint sounds from inside the building. However, the door refuses to budge.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_130中から物音が聞こえた……。
しかし、扉は固く閉ざされ、開かれる気配はない。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_131<tab>Food has been hung out to dry in the sun, and quite recently by your reckoning.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_131保存食が日干しにされている。
どれも、まだ食べられそうだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_132<tab>The cups are half-empty...or half-full, depending on how you see such things. Behind the counter, a kettle bubbles steadily over the stove.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_SYSTEM_000_132カウンターの上には、飲みかけの酒がある。
奥の鍋も、火にかけられたままだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_140<tab>What news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Were you able to find anything of note?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_140ああ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
そちらはどうだい……？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_A1_000_001<tab>People are definitely still living here.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_A1_000_001<tab>最近まで人がいた痕跡がある

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_A1_000_002<tab>I couldn't find our mysterious person.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_A1_000_002<tab>さっき逃げた人物が見当たらない

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_A1_000_003<tab>Maybe this place really is abandoned.
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_A1_000_003<tab>……やっぱり廃墟では？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_141<tab>Indeed. While there's no one to be seen, 'tis plain that this village is anything but abandoned.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_141そうだね、私も同じ所感だよ。
まるで、ついさっきまでは、普通に生活をしていたような……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_142<tab>Nor I. But while there's no one to be seen, 'tis plain that this village is anything but abandoned.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_142そうだね……順当に考えると、隠れているのだろう。
現に、村のいたるところに、
最近まで人がいたかのような痕跡が残っている……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_143<tab>I don't think so, my friend. While there's no one to be seen, 'tis plain that this village is anything but abandoned.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_143いや……村のいたるところに、
最近まで人がいたかのような痕跡が残っている。
ただの廃墟ではないようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_144<tab>If the villagers are trying to conceal themselves, they are doing a rather poor job of it. But if they don't wish to be seen, what are we to do?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_144私もそう思うわ。
っていうか、家の中にまだ誰かいそうなのよね。
扉は開けてくれないけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_145<tab>(-???-)I say, aren't you the ones who saved my life?
target: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_145<tab>(-？？？？-)も、もしや……あなた方は、以前私を助けてくださった……！

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_146<tab>You're Tristol, the artist from Eulmore!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_146君は確か……画家のトリストル！
ユールモアに入るために、知恵と絵筆を貸してくれた……！

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_147<tab>You remembered! Ever since we parted ways, I've worried for you, bound for the city as you were. Never did I imagine that we would meet again, and here of all places!
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_147ええ、ええ！　そのトリストルです。
ユールモアに向かったおふたりを、ずっと案じておりましたが、
まさかここで再会できるだなんて……！

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_148<tab>We could say the very same thing to you, my friend. I'm glad to see you hale and whole. But tell me, what is this village?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_148それは、こちらのセリフだよ。
君はここに住んでいるのかい？
この村は、いったい……？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_149<tab>This is Amity, a settlement made up of those who survived being exiled from Eulmore.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_149ここは「アミティー」の村……
ユールモアから追放されながら、かろうじて生き長らえた者が、
ひっそりと身を寄せ合って暮らす場所です。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_150<tab>As I wandered the wilds, I chanced to cross paths with an inhabitant of these parts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_150あなた方に助けられたあと、私は行く当てもなく、
コルシア島の荒れ野をさまよっていたのですが……
途中、「ある人」に見つけていただいたのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_151<tab>He took me through a secret tunnel which led to the top of the Bright Cliff. I've been here ever since. Life is hard, but we know a semblance of peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_151そして、彼の知る「秘密の抜け道」を通って、ここへ……。
以来、仲間とともに静かに暮らしておりました。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_152<tab>Well, we <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> at any rate─until Mt. Gulg broke away from the earth. Then just as suddenly, the Ladder started moving again...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_152しかし、唐突にグルグ火山が浮き上がったかと思ったら、
今度は、大昇降機まで動き出す音がして……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_153<tab>And you feared whoever was coming up would threaten your lives.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALISAIE_000_153ユールモアからの追手が来たと思って、
偵察に出たり、隠れたりした……ってところかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_154<tab>Aye... But I see now there's no cause for concern. Will you tell me what has brought you here?
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_154はい……。
しかし、何やら事情は異なっていた様子。
もしよければ、お話を聞かせてはいただけませんか？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_155<tab>So Vauthry is a sin eater, and he's fled to Mt. Gulg...
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_155なるほど……。
大罪喰いだったヴァウスリーを追って、
グルグ火山を目指していると。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_156<tab>'Tis a strange tale, but I have no reason to doubt your words.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_156尋常な話ではありませんが、
あのヴァウスリーが罪喰いだったという点は、
腑に落ちた心地です……。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_157<tab>I owe you my life. If there is anything I can do to help, you need but say the word.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_157とすれば、私も、この事態を見過ごせません。
何かお手伝いできることはありませんか……！？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_158<tab>Your help would be most welcome, Tristol. To begin with, we request your people's permission to reconnoiter the area.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_158ありがとう、トリストル。
ではひとまず、この周辺を私の仲間たちと探索することを、
許可してはもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_159<tab>If we are to confront Vauthry, we must find a way to reach Mt. Gulg.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_ALPHINAUD_000_159グルグ火山へ向かう道を、
どうにか見出さなければならないんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_160<tab>Of course, you hardly need our permission to be here. I will tell the others about you and yours.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_160その程度、断る理由もありません。
村の仲間たちには、私からよく話しておきましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_161<tab>Now, we haven't much to offer in the way of hospitality, but our village is at your disposal. Please use it as you see fit in your quest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKME105_03634_TRISTOL_000_161まずしい村ゆえ、もてなしはできませんが……
お好きに滞在し、ヴァウスリーへの足掛かりにしてください。
